thread.title: United Airlines Flights Grounded Worldwide After Computer Glitch
thread.title_full: United Airlines Flights Grounded Worldwide After Computer Glitch

author: senh
title: United Airlines Flights Grounded Worldwide After Computer Glitch
text: BING NEWS: Every United Airlines flight in U.S. briefly grounded due to computer issues NEW YORK — United Airline flights were briefly grounded Wednesday morning due to a problem ... UPDATE: United says computer glitch is causing a worldwide groundstop that is impacting approximately 3500 flights » http://t.co/VZUcbkLn9Z SeaTac spokesman ... 07/8/2015 - 3:03 am | View Link United Airlines Grounds Flights; Could Impact NY-Area Travelers FAIRFIELD COUNTY, Conn. -- United Airlines has grounded all of its flights worldwide on Wednesday due to a computer issue, according to NBC. Approximately 3,500 flights have been affected by the grounding, and could cause further delays at 235 domestic and ... 07/8/2015 - 3:01 am | View Link United Airlines Grounds All Domestic, International Flights Due To Computer Glitch United Airlines grounded all domestic and international flights Wednesday morning because of a major computer glitch ... that are currently causing significant delays at airports worldwide. “We experienced a network connectivity issue this morning ... 07/8/2015 - 3:00 am | View Link United Airlines flights grounded worldwide due to computer 'automation issues' All United Airlines flights have been grounded worldwide due to a computer glitch, the FAA said Wednesday morning. NBC News reports about 3,500 flights have been affected by the technical problems, and delays could impact 235 domestic and 138 international ... 07/8/2015 - 2:59 am | View Link United Airlines Confirms Flights Grounded Worldwide United Airlines grounded all flights worldwide Wednesday morning after its computer system suffered a technical glitch, causing a ripple effect of heavy delays throughout major airports. About 3,500 flights were being affected. The delays could reach 235 ...
